title: Sr Talent Acquisition Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness
Interview Descriptions: First I had a phone screen it went good. Then a schedule virtual  interview with the leadership team. The interview process went well. However, coming onboard everything was totally different then what it seems.
Interview Questions: What would you bring in this role?

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness (Forrest, IL) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed with the hiring manager and the VP. Job was offered after 2nd interview with VP.  The interview process was warm and welcoming. The Hiring manager was prepared to meet me. The interview was organized and the hiring manager was able to answer all of my questions.
Interview Questions: Why did you leave your last employer?

title: Referral Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed with two Supervisors as they were interviewing me for two different positions and gave me the opportunity to choose the one that I was most interested in. They also introduced me to the team members in each department.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness?

title: Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness (Chicago, IL) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: Where they asked about my qualifications and experience and I just want to read the reviews on this shady. Omlng It was a hiring process it review  the and hi Vernon whats up how’s it going shady. Omlng It was a hiring p
Interview Questions: Experience what is your in this field

title: General Dentist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness (Chicago, IL) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: Easy and laid back, the questions were very straightforward and the interviewer was interested in if it was a place I will stay long term if I get hired. It was more like a discussion instead of an interview and we talked about several life experiences.
Interview Questions: My previous experience, if this a good fit for me

title: Specialty Services Care Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness (Harvey, IL) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied via online job board and received a call for an interview within a week. I interviewed with the supervisor of the position. The interviewer was very welcoming and open about what the organization was seeking in a candidate. I received another call for a second interview about a week or so later. I interviewed with the program manager. I received a job offer after the second interview. The energy during the interview process was amazing and made me want the position even more.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself; what do you know about the organization; behavioral/situational questions (how would you handle ... / how have you handled ... In the past); familiarity with the area;

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness (Chicago, IL) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Phone screening then in person interview with the manager then a second one with the lead supervisor and the paperwork process which takes awhile you have your background and drug test completed along with all your references checked and completed

title: Outreach Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness (Chicago, IL)
Interview Descriptions: Very personable and competent supervisor for position provided interview. Was clear and thorough on expectations, challenges, priorities. The interviewer was prompt and thoughtful. I was impressed and look forward to similar experiences I the future.
Interview Questions: How would I balance my life around a schedule that included evenings, weekends and some holidays?

title: Shelter Care Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness (Chicago, IL)
Interview Descriptions: panel of 6;  sent in resume, received phone call for interview, on interview day, had to fill out application and other paperwork, had interview, received phone call a few days after interview
Interview Questions: despite asking how I take care of myself, they sure don't care about taking care of/looking after you

title: Clinical Coordinator for Tele-psychiatry Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Aunt Martha's Health & Wellness (Aurora, IL) in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: I was recrutied by Aunt Marths for this position.  I had two interviews and was offered the positions.
Interview Questions: The working enviornment and difficulties presented in the past in this position.
